languages.text: [Изобразить праведный гнев] "Через Иеронимуса яд скверны проник и в сердца его последователей! Они все сопричастны его преступлению, а значит их тоже надлежит покарать".

traits.locale_text: [Изобразить праведный гнев] "Через Иеронимуса яд скверны проник и в сердца его последователей! Они все сопричастны его преступлению, а значит их тоже надлежит покарать".

languages.text: [Feign righteous anger] "The venom of corruption, for which Hieronymus was the conduit, entered the hearts of his followers as well! They are all complicit in his crime, and therefore must share his punishment."
languages.original_text: [Изобразить праведный гнев] "Через Иеронимуса яд скверны проник и в сердца его последователей! Они все сопричастны его преступлению, а значит их тоже надлежит покарать".

[Feign righteous anger] "The venom of corruption, for which Hieronymus was the conduit, entered the hearts of his followers as well! They are all complicit in his crime, and therefore must share his punishment."

languages.text: [佯装义愤填膺]“希罗尼穆斯是腐化的传播者，腐化的毒液同样也流入了那些追随者的心中！那些人都是他的同谋，因此必须全都受到惩处。”
languages.original_text: [Feign righteous anger] "The venom of corruption, for which Hieronymus was the conduit, entered the hearts of his followers as well! They are all complicit in his crime, and therefore must share his punishment."

traits.locale_text: [佯装义愤填膺]“希罗尼穆斯是腐化的传播者，腐化的毒液同样也流入了那些追随者的心中！那些人都是他的同谋，因此必须全都受到惩处。”

languages.text: [正義の怒りを示す]「ヒエロニムスを媒介とした腐敗の毒は、信奉者たちの心にも入り込んだ！彼らは皆、ヒエロニムスの犯罪に加担しているのだ。全員裁かれるべきだ」
languages.original_text: [Feign righteous anger] "The venom of corruption, for which Hieronymus was the conduit, entered the hearts of his followers as well! They are all complicit in his crime, and therefore must share his punishment."

traits.locale_text: [正義の怒りを示す]「ヒエロニムスを媒介とした腐敗の毒は、信奉者たちの心にも入り込んだ！彼らは皆、ヒエロニムスの犯罪に加担しているのだ。全員裁かれるべきだ」

languages.text: [Fingir ira justa] «¡El veneno de la corrupción del que Hieronymus era el conducto se coló también en los corazones de sus seguidores! Son todos cómplices de su crimen, por lo que deben compartir su castigo».
languages.original_text: [Feign righteous anger] "The venom of corruption, for which Hieronymus was the conduit, entered the hearts of his followers as well! They are all complicit in his crime, and therefore must share his punishment."

traits.locale_text: [Fingir ira justa] «¡El veneno de la corrupción del que Hieronymus era el conducto se coló también en los corazones de sus seguidores! Son todos cómplices de su crimen, por lo que deben compartir su castigo».

languages.text: [Rechtschaffenen Zorn vortäuschen] "Das Gift der Verderbnis, für das Hieronymus der Kanal war, ist auch in die Herzen seiner Anhänger gesickert! Sie sind alle mitschuldig an seinem Verbrechen und müssen daher auch seine Strafe teilen."
languages.original_text: [Feign righteous anger] "The venom of corruption, for which Hieronymus was the conduit, entered the hearts of his followers as well! They are all complicit in his crime, and therefore must share his punishment."

traits.locale_text: [Rechtschaffenen Zorn vortäuschen] "Das Gift der Verderbnis, für das Hieronymus der Kanal war, ist auch in die Herzen seiner Anhänger gesickert! Sie sind alle mitschuldig an seinem Verbrechen und müssen daher auch seine Strafe teilen."

languages.text: [Feindre une juste colère] « Le venin de la corruption, dont Hiéronymus était le vecteur, s'est également insinué dans le cœur de ses disciples ! Tous sont complices de son crime et doivent partager son châtiment. »
languages.original_text: [Feign righteous anger] "The venom of corruption, for which Hieronymus was the conduit, entered the hearts of his followers as well! They are all complicit in his crime, and therefore must share his punishment."

traits.locale_text: [Feindre une juste colère] « Le venin de la corruption, dont Hiéronymus était le vecteur, s'est également insinué dans le cœur de ses disciples ! Tous sont complices de son crime et doivent partager son châtiment. »

languages.text: [Ahlaki sebeplerle öfkelenmiş rolü yap] "Hieronymus'un kaynağı olduğu yozlaşma zehri, takipçilerinin de kalplerini zapt etmiş! Hepsi de onun suç ortağı, dolayısıyla da cezasını paylaşmalılar."
languages.original_text: [Feign righteous anger] "The venom of corruption, for which Hieronymus was the conduit, entered the hearts of his followers as well! They are all complicit in his crime, and therefore must share his punishment."
